text:
<@U28TLDP0R>:
- for some reason the cardkingdom link is encroaching on the rest of the cards in the list. <https://edhrec.com/decks/arahbo-roar-of-the-world> example but its happening everywhere
- while you are there, can you add the card image hover on each card like we have on the front page daily commander? that would be a big improvement on it currently

attachments.text: EDH / Commander Decklist: Arahbo Roar of the World, 1 Adorned Pouncer, 1 Alms Collector, 1 Balan Wandering Knight, 1 Brimaz King of Oreskos, 1 Fleecemane Lion
